name: Wizard is Rolling
description:
Pick your skills and roll 4 wizard dices. If the dice combination matches, you will cast extraordinary magic spells. Let's roll for an epic adventure. More than 70 skills with different dice combination. Build your mighty wizard to fight against more than 70 unique monsters.

This is the best game to play at boring time inside elevator or transportation. It does not require network.

Support Language:
English, Chinese, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Spanish
